details.title: <Test Report> Splitter
details.description: Splits test report information into several endpoints

inputendpoint.name: test-report-list
inputendpoint.label: Test Report List
inputendpoint.description: List of Test Reports to split

outputendpoint.name: fail-count-list
outputendpoint.label: Fail Count List
outputendpoint.description: List with the number of failed tests

outputendpoint.name: pass-count-list
outputendpoint.label: Pass Count List
outputendpoint.description: List with the number of passed tests

outputendpoint.name: skip-count-list
outputendpoint.label: Skip Count List
outputendpoint.description: List with the number of skipped tests
